page.title: 19P.A.D.A. What they do ?
page.content:
{ Parents Against Drug Abuse}have rooms on top of a shop where parents of children who have a drugs problem can go to get help and advice. They have a 24 hour phone_in service where people can ring for information or help in trying to combat,and get off drugs.
"We hope we will soon get a special Rehbilitation Centre where people can get more help. We have been putting pressure on the local Council to show where there is a drugs problem, and to try and get the penalties for selling drugs increased."
When referring to the difficulties that face a drug addict it can be said { {"You can only say you are an ex_addict { on your deathbed."
